name: R in insurance 2014
body:
### Welcome to the _R in Insurance Conference_ site

The the second conference on R in Insurance will take place at Cass Business School in London on Monday 14 July 2014. 

The audience of the conference included both academics and practitioners who are active or interested in the applications of R in insurance.

Invited talks will be given by:
* [Arthur Charpentier](http://freakonometrics.hypotheses.org), Département de mathématiques Université du Québec à Montréal
* [Montserrat Guillen](http://www.ub.edu/riskcenter/mge.html), Dept. Econometrics University of Barcelona

The organisers, Andreas Tsanakas and Markus Gesmann, gratefully acknowledge the sponsorship of [Mango Solutions](http://www.mango-solutions.com), [RStudio](http://www.rstudio.com), [CYBAEA](http://www.cybaea.net) and [PwC](http://www.pwc.com).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
